metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11237 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An AVX-512-optimized implementation of the mempcpy function in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) 2.27 and earlier may write data beyond the target buffer, leading to a buffer overflow in __mempcpy_avx512_no_vzeroupper.

notes.Note: sbeattie> looks to have been introduced in 2.23

criterions.comment: eglibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
